POCs.PV_LIMIT_CTRL: Feeder2 PV-Infeed, Active power upper limit[0-->0%, 100-->100%]
POCs.NETZ_PH1_FEHLER_COUNTER: Feeder2 Status PH1, Number of detected faulty states since last disconnect of feeder2
POCs.NETZ_PH2_FEHLER_COUNTER: Feeder2 Status PH2, Number of detected faulty states since last disconnect of feeder2
POCs.NETZ_PH3_FEHLER_COUNTER: Feeder2 Status PH3, Number of detected faulty states since last disconnect of feeder2
POCs.UPDATE_REQUEST_TOPOLOGY: Feeder2 Request, External Request to Update(read in) Topology File
POCs.RUN_ONLINE_GRID_PROTECTION: Feeder2 Request, External Request to Run or Run not the Online Grid Protection
